name: Shield Wall
description:
Protect your castle in Shield Wall! Block arrows and earn points. Spend your points on upgrades or save them. 

My high score is 2274! Can you beat it? 

Developed by AjW 

*To address possible confusion: there were a few bugs I missed during the duration of the jam. The two notable bugs are associated with the upgrade costs. The first is a rounding error. The upgrade cost is always supposed to be a whole number, but sometimes reads like "300.000001." The second is a programming error. When you reach max level of an upgrade, it should read "MAX." But instead reads something like "1+E7," which I believe is indicating a very large number.
